channel.title: Making a website
channel.description:
hii guys i got a little question for my website i want to create a old runescape website i downloade this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=434096.0 but idk how to upload it and let it work i use 000webhost could someone make me a little tutorial
thank you

item.title: Making a website
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

someone2:

If you can’t even upload files to a website, give up making a RSPS.

not to be rude but yeah i agree with that. theres alot to owning and running an rsps, and if you cant do something as simple as that. ur getting no where.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a website
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

instead of using something like this, be more creative, just use a free website making site, they may not have as many features but it lets ur personal creativity show rather than using a base like that,

Read full topic
